name: v1.0.6 (VersionCode: 36)
body:
- added List Style (#168)
- now able to set custom ColumnCount for each Style (except NestedRecyclerView)
- removed ScrollToTop (#159)
- updated simplyfied chinese, polish & ukrainian translations
- code clean up

name: v1.0.5 (VersionCode: 35)
body:
- when deleting an image in ItemActivity the user no longer returns to the AlbumActivity
- added toggle to disable the SharedElementTransition & the PageTransformer (#108)
- added option to save edited Image as Copy (#143)
- UI change in the FileOperationDialog (#147)
- added toggle to show/hide videos in the Gallery
- Bug fixes in the EditImageActivity (in landscape image is no longer obscured by the Done-Button)
- added ScrollToTop onBackPressed() in the AlbumActivity
- ExifEditorActivity: added Menu-Button to clear most of the ExifData (#153)
- some UI changes
- added LightNavBar to SettingsActivity & ExifEditorActivity
- converted all drawable Icons to Vector drawables
- changed Adaptive Icon to VectorDrawable
- added Belarusian translation
- updated Libraries

name: v1.0.4 (VersionCode: 34)
body:
- Moving now automatically copies and the deletes the files, when the user selects to move files across storage devices
- updated adaptive icon
- added Progress-Notification when scanning paths
- Double-Tap-Zoom-Level set to 100%
- added Ukrainian and Japanese translation
- disabled sorting of shared pictures (issue #113)
- updated libraries

name: v1.0.3 (VersionCode: 33)
body:
- fixed issue #71 
- minor changes

name: v1.0.2 (VersionCode: 32)
body: - more Bug fixes

name: v1.0.1 (VersionCode: 31)
body:
- Bug & crash fixes
- removed Internet-Permissions to eliminate any privacy concerns

name: v1.0 (VersionCode: 30)
body: - Bug & Crash fixes

name: v1.7.2-beta (VersionCode: 29)
body:
- more Bug fixes
- updated translations

name: v1.7.1-beta (VersionCode: 28)
body: - Bug & Crash fixes

name: v1.7-beta (VersionCode: 27)
body:
- added the option to create Virtual Albums
- added DropDownMenu for Orientation & WhiteBalance in the ExifEditor
- added PictureInPicture-Mode to VideoPlayer
- added brazilian-portuguese & croatian translation
- fixed FloatingActionButton translation when a Snackbar is shown
- minor Bug fixes

name: v1.6.2.2-beta (VersionCode: 26)
body:
- added chinese translation
 - Bug & Crash fixes

name: v1.6.2.1-beta (VersionCode: 25)
body:
- added spanish & bulgarian translation
- updated libraries
- added ability to trigger the MediaScanner from the file explorer
- moved camera shortcut back to the fab

name: v1.6.2-beta (VersionCode: 24)
body:
- added ExcludePaths-Option to Settings
- added auto-refresh, when opening the app from recents
- added Russian, Polish & German translation
- mentioning translators in About
- added Select all button to AlbumActivity menu
- changed FileOperation to be a ForegroundService
- moved Camera-Shortcut to menu
- minor Ui changes (light theme accent color)
- disabled moving files from/onto removable storage
- lowered doubleTap zoom level
- bug & crash fixes

name: v1.6.1-beta (VersionCode: 23)
body:
- added italian translation
- added RAW support for .cr2 images
- now copying Exif data when cropping a picture
- now exporting non-jpg images to jpg when cropping
- implemented own CropImageView
- moved some drawables to vectorDrawables
- crash fixes, bug fixes & minor performance improvements
- removable storage Bug fixes

name: v1.6-beta (VersionCode: 22)
body:
- added image cropping and rotation
- added support for RAW images (.dng)
- added an adaptive icon
- added SetWallpaperActivity
- added Location to InfoDialog
- added FastScroller-Handle
- added French translation
- updated Android Support Libraries to v26
- updated Glide to v4
- fixed the removable storage permission Bug
- Bug fixes

name: v1.5.2-beta (VersionCode: 21)
body:
- now able to delete, copy & create files on removable storage
- added black theme
- now also using MediaStore to get DateTaken
- now also transferring DATE_TAKEN when copying, moving or renaming a file
- added "Open with..." button
- speed improvements for the SharedElementTransition
- fix ellipsize
- fixed bug with file extensions
- fixed crash when launching the app
- fixed issue with wrong cover image

name: v1.5.1-beta (VersionCode: 20)
body:
- new Icon !!!!
- added Sort by last modified for Albums
- added feature to pin albums to the top of the list
- added feature to rename albums
- minor Ui changes with the Cards-Style
- fixed Bug, where Camera Shortcut wouldn't work
- major Bug Fixes around FileOperations
- fixed issue with long folder names
- Bug fixes for the ExifEditor
- Bug & Crash fixes

name: v1.0-beta (VersionCode: 3)
body:
- added Drag-To-Select Feature
- bug fixes

name: v1.1.1-beta (VersionCode: 11)
body:
- added Exclude-Option to exclude folders or albums from showing up in the gallery
- added an option to create a new Directory, when copying or moving a file

- Bug fixes & performance improvements

name: v1.1-beta (VersionCode: 10)
body:
- fixed crashes:
	- crashes when opening big albums
	- crashes related to removable storage (e.g. SD Cards)

- added a FileExplorer to copy, move and delete files and directories
- added option to directly print images
- added option to share multiple items at once
- added support for removable storage (view, share, ...)
- minor ui changes
- speed improvements

name: v1.2-beta (VersionCode: 12)
body:
- added support for Api 19 KitKat
- Bug fixes

name: v1.2.1-beta (VersionCode: 13)
body: - minor ui adjustments for Kitkat devices

name: v1.3-beta (VersionCode: 15)
body:
- added VideoPlayer
- fixed crash, when opening the FileExplorer

name: v1.3.1-beta (VersionCode: 16)
body:
- it is now easier to copy & move files
- excluded album are now shown together with hidden albums, to make it easier to un-exclude albums
- polished some animations
- Bug fixes

name: v1.3.2-beta (VersionCode: 17)
body:
- InfoDialog now also show the Palette colors of the image
- fixes crash, where the app wouldn't open

name: v1.4-beta (VersionCode: 18)
body:
- added option to sort albums by name or size
- added option to sort items within an album either by last modified or name
- added setting to change the column count
- added a light theme option
- added option to choose home screen style
- completely re-coded the VideoPlayer; now using a different library
- added an Exif editor, to edit the Exif data of photos that support Exif
- minor ui adjustments
- bug fixes

name: v1.5-beta (VersionCode: 19)
body:
- added new Style: NestedRecyclerView
- added new Style: Cards 2
- added a Camera shortcut (can be enabled in settings)
- now supporting 8-Bit color (can be enabled in settings)
- changed font to RobotoMono
- added an indicator to show if an album is on removable storage
- fixed crash, when opening video on 4.4
- Bug fixes, when copying, moving or deleting files
- performance improvements
- Bug fixes

name: v1.0-beta (VersionCode: 1)
body: - initial release
